snippet: Through an unusual arrangement with Arizona State University, the company will pay for its workers to earn college degrees.
abstract: Starbucks announces arrangement with Arizona State University to provide free online college education to thousands of its workers; program is open to any of company's 135,000 United States employees, provided they work at least 20 hours a week and meet admissions requirements; employees who take advantage are not required to remain with Starbucks after their education.
lead_paragraph: Through an unusual arrangement with Arizona State University, the company will pay for its workers to earn college degrees.

headline.main: Starbucks to Provide Free College Education to Thousands of Workers
headline.print_headline: Starbucks to Provide Free College Education to Thousands of Workers
